page.title: 05The New Forest.
page.content: The New Forest District Council looks after the whole of the New Forest. The Hampshire County Council looks after the whole area of Hampshire.In Burley the firemen take care of the forest by putting out all the fires. There is also the Forestry Commission who look after the trees in the forest.What they do is that they fell all the trees which have some sort of disease in them.They also go around and if some trees are growing too close together they cut down the weaker trees and use them for timber. They look after the car parks too and make some new car parks if needed.If they didn't put in car parks the people might start driving over the grass.They also make picnic areas and put down the tables where people can have picnics.
